title: Predicting depth, surface normals and semantic labels with a common multi-scale convolutional architecture
excerpt: Abstract: In this paper we address three different computer vision tasks using a single basic architecture: depth prediction, surface normal estimation, and semantic labeling. We use a multiscale convolutional network that is able to adapt easily to each task using only small  ...
